#summary An Introduction to the Delivery Settings menu in the Admin CP
#labels Phase-Deploy

= Introduction =

The Delivery Settings menu is the first place to configure the order delivery options for your flumpshop.


= Menu Items =

 *[SupportedCountries Supported Countries] - Select which countries you are able to deliver to
 *[DeliveryRates Delivery Rates] - Add and view the costs of delivering an order
